content_en: Change duo Studio is a Taiwan design group, founded on the ideas that design form can serve algrothim,media, space, and activites inspiring surroundings and arising a positive effect on people’s lives.</br>Led by a couple of owners, studio work can be founded homes—often for creative production, web site,art collectors—to academic, cultural and civic projects
content_tw: 澄之朵工作室是台灣的設計團體，致力於透過演算法、多媒體、空間、活動策略來改善並活化人們的生活與環境。</br>由蕭澄之、黃瑋婕主持，工作室的工作項目含括平面設計、網頁設計、空間設計、並展現出對當代藝術觀點、演算技術與文化涵構的關懷。

content_en: Change duo Studio is a Taiwan design group, founded on the ideas that design form can serve algrothim,media, space, and activites inspiring surroundings and arising a positive effect on people’s lives.</br>Led by a couple of owners, studio work can be founded homes—often for creative production, web site,art collectors—to academic, cultural and civic projects
content_tw: 澄之朵工作室是台灣的設計團體，致力於透過演算法、多媒體、空間、活動策略來改善並活化人們的生活與環境。</br>由蕭澄之、黃瑋婕主持，工作室的工作項目含括平面設計、網頁設計、空間設計、並展現出對當代藝術觀點、演算技術與文化涵構的關懷。
